      • proxyHandlerName

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • proxyService

        public void proxyService(String serviceName,
                         String contextPath)
        Set up a load-balancing reverse proxy for the given service at the given context path. Requests to this proxy will be load-balanced among all instances of the service, as provided by our Topology.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the service to proxy
        contextPath - the context path expose the proxy under

      • proxiedServiceMappings

        public Map<String,String> proxiedServiceMappings()
        Get a map, keyed by service name, of the proxied service names and their context paths.
        Returns:
        the map of proxied services and their context paths

      • exposeTopologyEndpoint

        public void exposeTopologyEndpoint(boolean exposeTopologyEndpoint)
        Set to true to expose a Topology SSE endpoint and topology.js for consuming topology information from the browser. Set to false to disable this endpoint. Defaults to true.
        Parameters:
        exposeTopologyEndpoint - whether to expose the endpoint or not
